src_text: Lomhlangano WeKhabhinethi Lokhetsekile wekwevidiyo-inthanethi wabanjwa ngembi kwe-Lekgotla leKhabhineth
trg_text: Statement on the virtual Special Cabinet Meeting of Tuesday, 14 September 2021The virtual Special Cabinet Meeting was held before the commencement of the Cabinet Lekgotl

src_text: Tincumo TeKhabhinethi1.
trg_text: CABINET DECISIONS1.

src_text: Kwelulwa kwesikhatsi kweLibalavendlela Lenhlangano Yehayidrojini i-Hydrogen Society Roadmap (i-HSRM) Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile kwelulwa kwesikhatsi se-HSRM ngeminyaka le-10 letakI-HSRM inika Lisubuciko leHayidrojini laseNingizimu Afrika lelavunywa yiKhabhinethi nga-2007 kulungiselela lelive umnotfo wehayidrojin I-HSRM yakhela etukwaloko lesekuphunyelelwe kukutfola kuleminyaka le-10 leyendlulile kulungiselela iNingizimu Afrika kutsi sale isuka ekucwaningeni nasekutfutfukiseni icale kukhicita nekutsengis Kusebenta kahle kakhulu kwe-HSRM kuhlanganisa bonkhe bucwepheshe lobuphatselene nekukhicita ihayidrojini emikhakheni yeminotfo leminyenti leyehlukene iphindze futsi icinisekise kukhula kwemnotfo lokufaka konkhe ekhats Kwenta iNingizimu Afrika kutsi ibe yindzawo yemnotfo wehayidrojini lesimeme kanye nekukhulisa timakethe tangaphandle lekungatsengiswa kuto bucwepheshe behayidrojin
trg_text: The HSRM gives effect to the Hydrogen South Africa Strategy that was approved by Cabinet in 2007 to prepare the country for a hydrogen econom The HSRM builds on what has been achieved in the past 10 years to prepare South Africa to move from research and development to manufacturing and commercializatio

src_text: Kukhicitwa kwemikhicito kwehayidrojini netincenye kuleli kutawufaka sandla ekwakhiweni kwematfuba emisebenti nasekutfutfukisweni kwemakhono, kanye nekwenta kancono tingucuko kutemnotfo lokutawubese kuzuzisa umkhakha wemmango lobewukadze ute ematfuba phambilini, ikakhulukati bomake nelush I-HSRM yenta tingenelelo letitawufaka ligalelo ekuncishisweni kwemimoya lengcolisa umoya (i-GHG).
trg_text: Local manufacturing of hydrogen products and components will contribute towards job creation and skills development, and also enhance economic transformation that will benefit the previously marginalised sector of society, particularly women and yout

src_text: Emkhatsini waletinye tintfo itawenta kancono kufaka emandla agesi lovusetelwako kugridi yagesi lenkhulu futsi iphakamisa tingenelelo emkhakheni weTitfutsi Letinkhulu Talokwesindzako, lokungulokunye lokufaka sandla ekukhicitekeni kwe-GH
trg_text: It will amongst others enhance the provision of renewable energy to the main electricity grid and it proposes interventions in the Heavy-Duty Transport sector, which is one of the contributors in GHG emission

src_text: Lelibalavendlela kuboniswene kabanti ngalo nabo bonkhe badlalindzima labatsintsekako, kufaka ekhatsi ematiko ahulumende, tifundziswa, imikhakha letimele kanye nemikhandlu yetesayens Iniketa luhlakamsebenti lwekuchumanisa kute kutsi icinisekise kuhlanganiswa bonkhe bucwepheshe lobuphatselene nehayidrojini kanye nekutfutfukiswa kwemakhono aleliv Ledokhumenti utawutfolakala kuwebhusayithi yeLitiko Letesayensi Netekucanjwa kwalokusha letsi: wwdsgoza Sivumelwane Lesichitjelwe Setekuvikeleka Kwemikhicito Yenuzi (i-CPPNM) Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile kungeniswa ePhalamende kwetetfulo tekuchitjelwa kwe-CPPNM kute kutsi ikuvume, ngekuya kweSigaba se-231(2) seMtsetfosisekelo waseRiphabhulikhi yaseNingizimu Afrika wanga-1996, lobeka kutsi:
trg_text: The roadmap went through extensive consultation with all relevant stakeholders, including government departments, academia, private sector and science council It provides a coordination framework to ensure an integration of all hydrogen-related technologies and skills development for the countr The document will be made accessible through the Department of Science and Innovation website: wwdsgoza

src_text: Sivumelwane semave emhlaba sibopha Ummango kuphela ngemuva kwekutsi sivunywe ngesincumo nguko kokubili Libandla Lavelonkhe neMkhandlu Wetifundza Wavelonkhe .
trg_text: An international agreement binds the Republic only after it has been approved by resolution in both the National Assembly and the National Council of Provinces .

src_text: Tichibelo letentiwa ye-Ejensi Yemhlaba Emandla e-Athomi i-International Atomic Energy Agency (i-IAEA) ticinisa kuvikeleka kwelizingancane letemhlaba kwetikhungo netisetjentiswa kanye netintfo letisetjentiselwa tinhloso tekuthul Njengelilunga le-IAEA, iNingizimu Afrika yasisayina lesivumelwane yaphindze yasilungisa nga-2003.
trg_text: The amendments made by the International Atomic Energy Agency (IAEA) strengthen the global minimum physical protection of facilities and nuclear material used for peaceful purpose As a member of the IAEA, South Africa had signed this convention and subsequently ratified it in 2003.

src_text: Letichibelo talesivumelwane ticinisa tekuvikeleka kwavelonkhe kwemave langemalunga, kufaka ekhatsi tidzingo tekuvikeleka kwetisetjentiswa nemikhicito yenuz
trg_text: The amendments to the convention strengthens the national security of the member states, including the physical protection requirements for nuclear facilities and materia

src_text: Tiniketa luhlu lwemacala njengekutsengwa kulamanye emave kanye nekutsengisela lamanye emave imikhicito yenuzi ngaphandle kweligunyaphambilin Kwenta kancono kusebentisana emkhatsini wemave langemalunga ekwabelaneni lwati mayelana netento letephula umtsetfo wemikhicito yenuzi Kutjintjwa kwesiphehli selucwaningo lwenuzi i-SAFARI-1 Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile kwentiwa kwemklamo wesiphehli senuzi wetinhlosonyenti kutsi utsatse indzawo yesiphehli selucwaningo ye-SAFARI-1 lengeyeNhlangano Yetemandla Enuzi YaseNingizimu Afrika (i-NECSA).
trg_text: Cabinet approved the setting up of the multi-purpose nuclear reactor project to replace the current SAFARI-1 nuclear research reactor owned by the South African Nuclear Energy Corporation (NECSA).

src_text: Lesiphehli besiloku sisebenta kusukela nga-1965 futsi sikhatsi sayo sekuphelelwa ngemandla ekusebenta sitawufika ekupheleni kwaso nga-2032.
trg_text: The reactor has been in operation from 1965 and its lifespan is due to end in 2032.

src_text: I-SAFARI-1 ingulomunye webakhiciti labane labahamba embili be-radioisotopes etekwelashwa emhlabeni lasetjentiselwa kwelapha tigidzi tetigulane ngemnyak Iphindze futsi yesekele lelive kulucwaningo lwetesayensi, kutekutfutfuka kanye nekwakhiwa kwemitsi lemisha, kutekulima, kutesayensi yetintfo letafa kanye nesayensi yetintfo letiphilak
trg_text: SAFARI-1 is one of the four leading producers of medical radioisotopes in the world used to treat millions of patients annuall It also provides the country with support in science research, development and innovation in medicine, agriculture, paleontology and bioscienc

src_text: Lokutjintjwa kutawucinisekisa kutsi iNingizimu Afrika ichubeka nekuba ngulelinye lemave lahamba embili kulemikhakha iphindze futsi izuze kulobucwepheshe lobusha kulomkhakh Lomklamo utawuholwa ngematiko lamanyenti labaphatselene naloku kanye ne-NECSA njengeklayenti lenkhulu Umbiko Wakamuva Wemhlangano Wesine Lobanjwa Njalo Ngemuva Kweminyaka Lemibili WaseNingizimu Afrika Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile kungeniswa kweMbiko Wakamuva Wemhlangano Wesine Lobanjwa Njalo Ngemuva Kweminyaka Lemibili waseNingizimu Afrika
trg_text: The replacement will ensure South Africa remains one of the leading countries in these fields and benefit from the new technologies in this environmen The project will be led by a number of related departments and NECSA as the main client

src_text: loniketa takamuva temitamo yalelive yekunciphisa tingucuko tesimo selitulu nekusenta sifanele
trg_text: which provides an update on the country s efforts to mitigate and adapt to climate change

src_text: kuSivumelwane Seluhlakamsebenti Lwamhlabuhlangene Lwetetingucuko Tesimo Selitulu (i-UNFCCC).
trg_text: to the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC).

src_text: Lombiko wendlala tinchubomgomo letifezekisiwe kanye netinyatselo netento letentiwe ngulelive kunciphisa kukhiciteka kwe-GH Uphindze unikete takamuva mayelana netingenelelo tekuntjintjela kumnotfo wesikhuntsa lesisezingeni leliphasi loholwa nguMtsetfosihlongoto weNchubomgomo Yavelonkhe Yetekubukana Netingucuko Tesimo Selitul INingizimu Afrika itinikele kufaka ligalelo ngalokufanele kulemitamo yemave emhlaba kutsi kusimamiswe kukhiciteka kwe-GHG ngekhatsi kwalokubeka embili kwalelive lokufanele kutsi kutfutfukisw Njengalomunye losayinela i-UNFCCC, iNingizimu Afrika ilindzeleke kutsi ingenise lemibiko yakamuva lengeniswa njalo-nje Ligalelo Lelincunywa Velonkhe (i-NDC) Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile kungeniswa ku-UNFCCC kwemkhakha lohlosiwe wekunciphisa tingucuko tesimo selitulu letibuyeketiwe te-NDC yeNingizimu Afrika tanga-2030.
trg_text: The report outlines the policies implemented as well as the measures and actions undertaken by the country to reduce GHG emission It also provides an update on the transitioning interventions towards a lower carbon economy guided by the National Climate Change Response Policy White Pape

src_text: Iningizimu Afrika ibuyekete umkhakha wayo lohlosiwe wanga-2025 kusuka ku-398 kuya ku-510 nelanga- 2030 kusuka ku-350 kuya ku-420 Metric tons Carbon Dioxide equivalent (Mt Co2-eq).
trg_text: South Africa has made a commitment to contribute fairly to the global efforts to stabilise GHG emissions within the country s developmental prioritie As a signatory to the UNFCCC, South Africa is expected to submit these updated reports regularly

src_text: Ngaphasi kwaleSivumelwane i-Paris Agreement onkhe emacembu adzingakala kutsi afake ema-NDC njalo ngeminyaka lesihlan INingizimu Afrika yafaka i-NDC yayo yekucala ku-UNFCCC ngeMphala nga-2015, yatinikela kugcina kukhiciteka kwe-GHG ngekhatsi emkhakheni kusuka ku-398 kuye ku-614 Mt CO2-eq nga-2025 nanga-2030.
trg_text: Cabinet approved the submission of the amended CPPNM to Parliament for approval, in terms of Section 231(2) of the Constitution of the Republic of South Africa of 1996, which states that:

src_text: LeSivumelwane siphindze futsi sifune kwehlisa emazingakushisa emave emhlaba abe ngaphansi kwema-degrees Celsius lamabili nemitamo yemoya ibe ngema-degrees Celsius langu- Onkhe emacembu alindzeleke kutsi alungise abe nemigomo yawo yanga-2015 ibe yakamuva nga-2020 kucinisekisa kutsi ahambisana nesayensi yakamuv Lomkhakha lobuyeketiwe wemigomo ufaka ekhatsi imibiko yakamuva yePhaneli Yabohulumende Yetingucuko Tesimo Selitulu, futsi ihambisana babo bonkhe badlalindzima labatsintsekako labafaka ligalelo emitameni yaleliv
trg_text: The HSRM effectively integrates all hydrogen-related technologies in various sectors of the economy and also fosters an inclusive economic growt It positions South Africa as a destination with sustainable hydrogen economic capability and to also expand

src_text: Imitsetfosivivinyo1.
trg_text: Replacement of SAFARI-1 nuclear research reactor

src_text: Umtsetfosivivinyo wanga-2021 Wekuchibela Kungcoliseka Kwelwandle (Kuvikela Kungcoliseka lokuvela kuMikhumbi) Ikhabhinethi iwuvumile Umtsetfosivivinyo wanga-2021 Wekuchibela Kungcoliseka Kwelwandle (Kuvikela Kungcoliseka lokuvela kuMikhumbi) kutsi ummango uphawule ngaw Umtsetfosivivinyo Wekuchibela uhlose kuchibela Umtsetfo wanga-2021 Wekuchibela Kungcoliseka Kwelwandle (Kuvikela Kungcoliseka lokuvela kuMikhumbi), wanga-1986 (Umtsetfo-2 wanga-1986) bese iwenta kutsi uhambisane neSivumelwane Semave Emhlaba Sekuvikela Kungcoliseka lokuphuma Emikhunjini (i-MARPOL).
trg_text: It provides a list of offences such as the import and export of nuclear material without prior authorisatio It enhances cooperation amongst member states in the sharing of information in respect of illegal activities on nuclear material

src_text: INingizimu Afrika isayine i-MARPOL, sivumelwane semave emhlaba lesikhulu lesimayelana nekuvikela kungcoliseka kwendzawo yaselwandle lokuvela emikhunjini noma lokubangeke ngengot LoMtsetfosivivinyo Wekuchibela utawufaka ligalelo ekongiweni kwendzawo yaselwandle ngekutsi kucedvwe kungcoliseka kwelwandle lokubangelwa kucitseka kwe-oyili kanye naletinye tintfo letiyingot
trg_text: The HSRM also provides interventions that will contribute towards the reduction of greenhouse gas (GHG) emission

src_text: Uphindze futsi uphakamise kutsi imikhumbi ifanele kutsi emafutsa lanesibabuli lesingekho ngetulu kwe-0,50% noma-ke isebentise tinchubo letivunyiwe tekubukana nesibabuli Umtsetfosivivinyo Wekuchibela Tetinkampani wanga-2021 Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile kushicilelwa kweMtsetfosivivinyo Wekuchibela Tindzaba Tetinkampani wanga-2021 kutsi ummango uphawule ngaw LoMtsetfosivivinyo uchibela Umtsetfo Wetinkampani, wanga-2008 (Umtsetfo we-71 wanga-2008).
trg_text: Cabinet approved the extension of the HSRM for the next 10 year

src_text: Ikhabhinethi yavuma ngeNgci nga-2018 kutsi ummango uphawule ngaloMtsetfosivivinyo lokhona kwamanje futsi umphumela waloko waholela ekutsini kwentiwe lolunye luhlaka lwetichibel
trg_text: Cabinet approved the submission of the country s 4th Biennial Update Report

src_text: Letichibelo letibuyeketiwe tenta kutsi kube nekucaciseleka lokukhulu kuletinye tindzinyana taloMtsetfosisekelo, letihlose kunciphisa kulawulwa kwemabhizinisi; kucinisa emagebe ekulwa nekushushunjiswa kwemali; kuncinisa tidzingo tekudzalula kanye nekwenta kancono emandla ebadlalindzima labatsintsekako enkampanin
trg_text: Extension of the Hydrogen Society Roadmap (HSRM)

src_text: Umtsetfosivivinyo Wavelonkhe Wetingucuko Tesimo Selitulu Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile kwetfulwa ePhalamende kweMtsetfosivivinyo Wekuchibela teTingucuko Tesimo Selitul
trg_text: Amended Convention on the Physical Protection of Nuclear Material (CPPNM)

src_text: LoMtsetfosivivinyo uhlose kuniketa lithulusi letemtsetfo kutekufezekiswa kweNchubomgomo Yavelonkhe Tetekubukana Netingucuko Tesimo Selitul
trg_text: export markets on hydrogen technologie

src_text: Ivumela kutsi kuhambisana kwetinchubomgomo lokutawuba nemtselela ekubukaneni kwalelive netingucuko nekugucuka kwesimo selitul Iniketa kuhleleka kwenchubekelembili yalelive kutsi ligucukele kumnotfo wesikhuntsa selizinga leliphasi nalomelana nekugucuka kwesimo selitul LoMtsetfosivivinyo sewuvele wendluliswe enchubeni lenkhulu yekukhulumisana lefaka ekhatsi badlalindzima labatsintsekak Kubekwa EtikhundleniKutawuhlolwa ticu tabo bonkhe lababekwe etikhundleni kubuye futsi kucinisekiswe kufaneleka kwabo mayelana netekuphepha Mn Smunda Mokoena, ubekwe njengaSihlalo weMlawuli Wavelonkhe Wetemandla waseNingizimu Afrika Dk Margaret Mkhosi-Motsaathebe ubekwe njengeSisebenti Lesikhulu Lesiphetse Savelonkhe seSikhungo Sekulahlwa Kwenkhukhuma Leyingoti Lekhipha Imiseb Imibuto: M Phumla Williams
